video.title: Firefly
video.synopsis: Set almost 500 years in the future, this short-lived but much-loved series follows the adventures of the ragtag crew of the spaceship Serenity.

episodes.synopsis: After taking aboard a group of passengers bound for another planet, the crew encounters lawmen and savages as they try to rid of precious cargo.
episodes.title: Serenity

episodes.synopsis: Mal and his crew are hired to pull off a train heist, but the cargo turns out to be badly needed medication for sufferers of a deadly disease.
episodes.title: The Train Job

episodes.synopsis: The crew discovers the sole survivor of a Reaver attack, leading to an encounter with an alliance commander bent on capturing Simon and River.
episodes.title: Bushwhacked

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to initiate a smuggling transaction, Mal attends an elegant social event. But when Mal upsets a wealthy man, he is challenged to a sword fight.
episodes.title: Shindig

episodes.synopsis: Book is critically injured when the crew of the Serenity is caught in the crossfire between policemen and outlaws; Simon is kidnapped.
episodes.title: Safe

episodes.synopsis: After ridding a planet of a group of bandits, Mal and his crew are honored for their heroism. Later Mal learns he inadvertently married a local.
episodes.title: Our Mrs. Reynolds

episodes.synopsis: When the Serenity crew travels to a planet to strike a smuggling deal, Jayne discovers that the populace worships him as a hero.
episodes.title: Jaynestown

episodes.synopsis: The crew abandons ship when the Serenity is crippled by an explosion, leaving behind a dying Mal, who recalls how he first acquired the vessel.
episodes.title: Out of Gas

episodes.synopsis: Disguised as medical personnel, the crew infiltrates a hospital with the intention of stealing valuable supplies.
episodes.title: Ariel

episodes.synopsis: The crew stages a rescue mission when Niska takes Mal prisoner and subjects him to torture; Inara raises eyebrows when she takes a female client.
episodes.title: War Stories

episodes.synopsis: Mal's "wife" Saffron has a plan to steal a valuable gun, but the plan goes awry when the gun's owner turns out to be another of Saffron's husbands.
episodes.title: Trash

episodes.synopsis: Mal and Zoe receive a crate containing the body of an old wartime friend, but the man turns out to be very much alive -- and smuggling a secret cargo.
episodes.title: The Message

episodes.synopsis: The Serenity crew defends a bordello against a gunslinger who got a prostitute pregnant and now intends to collect the child.
episodes.title: Heart of Gold

episodes.synopsis: A bounty hunter bent on apprehending River -- and collecting the reward for her capture -- boards the ship at night, catching the crew off guard.
episodes.title: Objects in Space
